title: [QUESTION] Accessing SKCanvasView from a ViewModel (Prism MVVM)
body:
Hi,

I have Skia's OnCanvasViewPaintSurface working with Prism's EventToCommandBehavior's but now I want to InvalidateSurface but to do that I need a reference to SKCanvasView. In every example I've seen Skia is setup with Forms where you can access the CanvasView by name from the code behind. How do I get the SKCanvasView from a ViewModel?

Thanks
